data.title: About – Bob Waters Realty Group
data.text:
Bob and Jan Waters along with Stacy Guevara, our Administrator, make up The Bob Waters Realty Group.

Since 2003 we bring sales and marketing knowledge and experience to each transaction and have helped hundreds of individuals and families achieve their real estate goals. We are passionate about our business and make ourselves available to our clients each and every day, until the deal is done.

As a team, our objective is to exceed our clients’ expectations by delivering personalized care, professional guidance and efficient administrative services. We treat all of our customers with respect and appreciate the opportunity to meet so many people. Furthermore, we look forward to continuing our relationships with our clients long after the transaction has closed.

Service Areas & Specialties

As Realtors we specialize in single family homes, condominiums, investment and life style properties throughout the metro area with emphasis in Saint Louis and Saint Charles Counties including Chesterfield, Wildwood, Ballwin, Ellisville, Town & Country, Dardenne Prairie, Saint Peters and O’Fallon among others. No property is too big or too small for our team.

Bob Waters Realty Group consistently ranks in the top 2% of all Saint Louis Realtors. Our work has been recognized by the Saint Louis Business Journal and other publications and we have achieved multiple awards for our work including International Presidents Circle, Presidents Elite Circle, Diamond Club and are Coldwell Banker Outstanding Customer Service Award recipients.

Give us a chance to show you what a difference The Bob Waters Realty Group can make.

Personal

Bob: Married to my wife and business partner Jan and reside in Clarkson Valley where we enjoy cooking and entertaining. We also do volunteer work for the Ronald McDonald House, Melanoma Hope Network and The Alzheimer’s Association. Among our many interests is spending time with our family and of course, our dogs (Caesar-our love sponge Bichon rescue and Beau-our Bichon pup), as well as our passion for real estate. We would appreciate the opportunity to assist you in any way we can! Thanks for your consideration!

Jan: Not much I can add to Bob’s note, except that I’m lucky enough to be married to my best friend…need I say more? I thoroughly enjoy real estate and can’t picture myself doing anything else! My corporate background consists of 30+ years at Maritz Travel Company and in 2007, I joined Bob in Real Estate. In October 2016 we added family members…Jill (our daughter) and Bob Day, and our grandchildren, Rob and Claire, I can’t express how excited we are to have them in our lives! Thanks for the opportunity to assist you in your real estate needs!
